ICS-CERT_Advisory_Title: GE Proficy HMI/SCADA Cimplicity Integer Overflow
Products_Affected: Proficy HMI/SCADA – CIMPLICITY: Version 4.01 and greater and Proficy Process Systems with CIMPLICITY. Note: Proficy HMI/SCADA—Cimplicity Versions 4.0 and prior are not affected by this vulnerability.
